column1: Little Goat Diner////Went to The Little Goat for a spontaneous date night with my wife and was very surprised by the experience! The atmosphere is very casual with a modern dinner style feel.  The music was not so load that is hindered conversation.  The food was delicious!  We had the paratha burrito
column2: macho nachos (without meat) and the tempura mashed potatoes. The tempura potatoes is a mush try! The nachos are a meal of its own; don't be fooled by the fact that it is listed as an accompaniment.  The parathas came with a delicious sauce
column4: fresh greens and red kidney beans. We did not try their famous burgers however we will return to try the burgers and mushroom pasta.  Finally
column5: the meal was very reasonably priced so if you are looking for delicious food at a reasonable price than look no further!
